Key Match Events: Jordan Walker hit a long two-run homer in the fifth
Lars Nootbaar hit a bases-clearing two-strike double in the seventh
Lars Nootbaar added a two-run homer in the ninth
Miscellaneous Highlights: The lead in the American League East over Baltimore was trimmed to a half-game
Others: Anthony Rizzo hit an RBI double to start a three-run fifth ahead of run-scoring singles by Alex Verdugo and Gleyber Torres
Anthony Volpe hit an RBI single and Torres lifted a tying sacrifice fly in the sixth
Victor Scott II hit an RBI double and scored on a throwing error by reliever Phil Bickford as the Cardinals set season highs for runs and hits (21)
